# scrollRectToVisible(_:)

**Instance Method**

Initiates a scroll in the layer’s closest ancestor scroll layer so that the specified rectangle becomes visible.

## Declaration

```swift
func scrollRectToVisible(_ r: CGRect)
```

## Parameters

- **r**: The rectangle to be made visible.

## Discussion

If the layer is not contained by a [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAScrollLayer] object, this method does nothing.

## Scrolling

- **visibleRect**: The visible region of the layer in its own coordinate space.
- **scroll(_:)**: Initiates a scroll in the layer’s closest ancestor scroll layer so that the specified point lies at the origin of the scroll layer.
